content: * please note this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free version on my blog www theturtletrunk com * the bonfire scarf is the perfect fall + winter accessory it features beautiful texture fun stripes and twisted fringe this pattern is easy to work up and uses a simple two stripe repeat it s easy enough that you don t have to focus too hard but it s interesting enough so you won t get bored the bonfire scarf also features twisted fringe ends and can be made in a number of sizes finished sizes kids standard 48 x 9 kids large 48 x 21 adult standard 60 x 9 adult large 60 x 21 photos for listing show an adult large size instructions also include how to adjust the length and width to be any size difficulty advanced beginner / easy standard us crochet terms pattern includes - detailed written instructions - instructions on adjusting scarf size - gauge pattern - link to the free video tutorial - special stitch instructions with photos - photos for reference - how to make twisted fringe supplies needed medium 4 weight yarn 6 50mm k hook yarn needle scissors and tape measure
